name: unneutered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an animal) that has not been castrated or spayed (= had part of its sex organs removed so that it cannot produce young animals): He said that unneutered dogs are almost three times more likely to bite than neutered dogs. Synonym
unaltered USOpposite
neutered
More examplesFewer examplesThe incidence of the virus is highest among unneutered tom cats because of their tendency to fight and mate widely.It is advised that pet ferrets should be neutered, as unneutered jill ferrets that are not mated regularly fall ill and frequently die.Prostate enlargement is mostly diagnosed in unneutered dogs.I volunteer for my local animal shelter and have seen the condition these unspayed and unneutered rabbits arrive in.
